title: Fortify eSports - Looking for Analyst
body:
Hey guys, Foritfy eSports are currently looking for an Analyst.
Fortify eSports are a proud gaming organisation with access to a ts server, coaching and management.
REQUIREMENTS-
1. Ability to watch and pull apart games both on a team and individual level.
2. Great communication skills.
3. Positive attitude and willingness to learn and push the team to find areas to work on.
4. Available most nights throughout the week but also having time to watch games and write up reports.
5. Must be able to provide constructive criticism and positive feedback.
6. Be up to date with current meta and teams.
If you are interested and would like a chance to trial you can message me on league Draxxon.
cheers guys.

replies.body: hey bud, you got twitter or anything i can chat to you about? im putting my name up there for a lot of roles and got some feedback already but would be good to have a chat.
